description: This file initializes an agent with specific tools and performs a series of print_response calls related to issue management, such as retrieving user details, showing issues, creating and updating issues, and filtering issues by user and priority.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform actions using specified tools.

classes.name: LinearTools
classes.description: Provides linear tools functionalities used by the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response message, likely for logging or user interaction.
